channel.title: Please!

item.title: Please!
item.dc:creator: @ta1nt3d ta1nt3d
item.description:
@ta1nt3d wrote:

ok so i vain i has been helping me and im sure i am close but i have been fiddleing with the code for an hour now and still cant get it

please someone tell me what i am doing wrong? what i am trying to do is add a 1 hour timer to this command

if (playerCommand.equals("vote")) { long commandDelay = 3600000; //1 hour // loop for stupid stuff if (System.currentTimeMillis() - commandDelay < 3600000 ) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.getPA().sendFrame126("www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?action=up&server=tainted-pkz.no-ip.org", 12000); //actions to do commandDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.sendMessage("You receive 10 pk points and 10m for voting you can do this once every hour."); c.pkPoints += 10; c.getItems().addItem(995, 10000000); } } }

when compile it gives no errors but when using the command in-game it linkis you to the vote site but does not give the items/pkpoints/send the message and you can still use it over and over as many times as you want

please if someone can spoonfeed my dumbass i would love you no homo
and if you where to spoon feed me i promise i will be learning not just leeching a spoon-fed code
and that is what i am here for is to learn so i can come here and help ppl insted of needing the help myself
so PLEASE someone atleast tell me what i am doing wrong
vain said i needed to put the timer in the loop and that i had the loop in the timer? idk what to do tho so please i beg

Read full topic
